Summary: a dull red object moving erraticly
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Richmond
There were no other sightings in Richmond on or around July 29th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home on the skytrain when I just felt like I had to get off and walk across the train bridge which has a pathway under it. As I always do when im out late i look at the stars and all that stuff. I was about a 3rd of the way across when I noticed a small star like red object moving erraticly at 10:33pm. After a few seonds it dissapeared. At first I thought nothing of it, A few minutes later at 10:41pm I saw an intensly bright white light appear then dissapear. Then a few minutes after that at 10:53pm I saw what I believed to be a sattilite, But the odd thing about the sattilite type thing is that it soon became intensly bright just like the event before this then discharged a red object like the first event then dimmed out to much dimmer than it was origionally then dissapeared.
